alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 07 at 6:57PM EDT until August 07 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 657 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Pleasant Mount, or 11 miles northwest of Honesdale, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Rutledgedale around 715 PM EDT. Equinunk around 725 PM EDT. Callicoon around 730 PM EDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
